original_text:
Then they would put their trust in God
    and would not forget his deeds
    but would keep his commands.
korean_text: 그들로 그들의 소망을 하나님께 두며 하나님께서 행하신 일을 잊지 아니하고 오직 그의 계명을 지켜서

sentences.original_text: Then they would put their trust in God
and would not forget his deeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 행적을 잊지 않을 것입니다
